author: Novelty
title: Cockpits Galore
review: Every space custom set maker knows it's the cockpits that make or break a custom MOC and this set provides 4 different cockpits for use in making various things from a helicopter to a jet fighter to a futuristic spaceship.  More mundane uses can also be made for some of these pieces - as doors and windors on buildings, ramps and the like.  The only down point in this pack is that it is only available in blue.
